title: Replace splash screen logo, remove dashboard header logo, and shrink course card height

requirements.text: Update the Splash Screen to remove the current AppLogo-based logo and instead render a new static PNG logo showing a person preparing for PSC with many books in front. Display the tagline text exactly "सफलता को साथी" under the logo (replacing the current tagline text).

quotes: पहिलो पेज को logo remove garnus tes thaunma psc ko tayari gare rayako ra aagadi dharai book rakhako png logo halnus tala सफलता को साथी लेख्नुहोस

acceptanceCriteria: On the splash screen, the logo shown is the new PSC-preparation PNG (not the current AppLogo globe/education logo).
The splash screen tagline text is exactly "सफलता को साथी" (same spelling and spacing).
No other splash screen content (e.g., title timing/navigation behavior) regresses.

requirements.text: On the main Dashboard header, remove the small earth/globe-with-book logo (the AppLogo component) so it is no longer displayed in the header row.

quotes: main page ko sano earth ko mathi book rakhako logo remove garnus

acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard header no longer renders the AppLogo image next to the avatar/title.
Header layout remains aligned and visually balanced after removing the logo.

requirements.text: Make the "खरिदार तयारी कोर्स" course card/box on the Dashboard smaller in vertical size by reducing its effective height (primarily by bringing the bottom edge/spacing upward) while keeping the left, right, and top visual edges consistent with the current design.

quotes: खरीदार तयारी कोर्स लेखको box ko size सानो गर्नुहोस left, right र mathi को line seme tara tala ko line halka माथि ल्याउनु paro size  सानो गर्नाको लागि

acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard course card is visibly shorter in height than before (less vertical padding/space), without changing its overall width.
The card’s left/right/top visual boundaries remain consistent with the current style; only the vertical size is reduced.
Course carousel and course text remain readable and not clipped on common mobile viewport sizes.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not route generated/static images through the backend; serve them from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Do not change bookmark sync, exams, old questions, or other learning content modules.
Do not redesign the overall app theme beyond the specific UI adjustments requested.

required: PSC exam preparation logo illustration: person studying for PSC with many books in front, PNG with transparent or clean background (psc-study-logo.dim_512x512.png)
